channel.title: Cant connect
channel.description:
when i type in
moparscape.minecraft.org it says outdated server?
help please

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2XYPMC2G[/quote]

Did that and got:

EDIT:

im in thank you

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Where in the world did you get the address “moparscape.minecraft.org”, does it look like I own minecraft.org to you? Look in your URL bar right now and connect to that.

Either:
moparcraft.net
or
minecraft.moparisthebest.com

Have fun!

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:402945”]Oh you have version 1.7.x, you’ll need to downgrade to 1.6.x. Use this minecraft.jar: http://www.mediafire.com/?ppu3ftwk9660r9x
Once you download it, place it in your .minecraft\bin folder. To get to that folder, open the game, click on “Mods and Texture Packs”, then click on “Open texture pack folder”. Browse back one level, then open the bin folder. Replace the minecraft.jar there with the one you have. Make sure to backup the 1.7.x one if you want it.[/quote]

Did what you said and I got an error, saying it couldnt load the manifest or something? Teamveiwer please?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Oh you have version 1.7.x, you’ll need to downgrade to 1.6.x. Use this minecraft.jar: http://www.mediafire.com/?ppu3ftwk9660r9x
Once you download it, place it in your .minecraft\bin folder. To get to that folder, open the game, click on “Mods and Texture Packs”, then click on “Open texture pack folder”. Browse back one level, then open the bin folder. Replace the minecraft.jar there with the one you have. Make sure to backup the 1.7.x one if you want it.

Read full topic
